翿翿翿
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

Related Character(s): 翳
Связанный символ (и): 翳

翿字的基本解释

翿
dào
古代羽舞或葬礼所用的旌旗，即羽葆幢。

翿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dào］
［《廣韻》徒到切，去号，定。］
［《廣韻》徒刀切，平豪，定。］
即纛。顶上以羽毛为饰的旗。古代乐舞者执之以舞。亦用以导引灵柩。

翿字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【羽字部】　翿； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页960第13
【廣韻】徒到切【集韻】【韻會】大到切【正韻】杜到切，?音導。【玉篇】同翳。【爾雅·釋言】翿，纛也。【註】今之羽葆幢。【詩·王風】君子陶陶，左執翿。【傳】纛也，翳也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?徒刀切，音陶。義同。　又【集韻】杜皓切，音道。義同。

考證：〔【詩·王風】君子揚揚，左執翿。〕　謹照原文揚揚改陶陶。
翿字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
翿字的起名意思

暂无。

翿
Basic explanation of words
翿
dào
The banner used in ancient feather dances or funerals is Yu Baozhuang.
翿
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dào］
["Guangyun" only to cut, go to the number, set. ]
["Guangyun" cuts with a knife, Pinghao, Ding. ]
That is hu. A flag decorated with feathers on top. Ancient music dancers insisted on dancing. It is also used to guide the coffin.
翿
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [The Department of Yu Zi] 　翿; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: page 960 13
[Guang Yun] Only to cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] Big to cut [Zheng Yun] Du to cut, sound guide. [Jade articles] The same with Yi. 【Erya·Explanation】Huan, Hun also. [Note] Today's Yu Baozhu. 【Poetry·Wang Feng】The gentleman Tao Tao, Zuo Zhihong. [Biography] Zhu Ye, Yi Ye.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Cut with a knife, sound pottery. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Du Haoqie, sound. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Poetry·Wang Feng] The gentleman Yang Yang, Zuo Zhiyi. 〕　I would like to change the pottery according to the original text.
